remarks: Continuity of the metric function; analogue of ~ cnmpt12f which cannot be used directly because ` D ` is not necessarily a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cnmpt1ds.d $e |- D = ( dist ` G ) $.
cnmpt1ds.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) $.
cnmpt1ds.r $e |- R = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) $.
cnmpt1ds.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. MetSp ) $.
cnmpt1ds.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
cnmpt1ds.a $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> A ) e. ( K Cn J ) ) $.
cnmpt1ds.b $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> B ) e. ( K Cn J ) ) $.
cnmpt1ds $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> ( A D B ) ) e. ( K Cn R ) ) $.
$d D x $.
$d G x $.
$d J x $.
$d K x $.
$d R x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
